columns.name: api_id
columns.description: The API's identifier. This identifier is unique across all of APIs in API Gateway

columns.name: version
columns.description: A version identifier for the API

columns.name: api_key_source
columns.description: The source of the API key for metering requests according to a usage plan

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: The timestamp when the API was created

columns.name: minimum_compression_size
columns.description: A nullable integer that is used to enable compression (with non-negative between 0 and 10485760 (10M) bytes, inclusive) or disable compression (with a null value) on an API. When compression is enabled, compression or decompression is not applied on the payload if the payload size is smaller than this value

columns.name: policy
columns.description: A stringified JSON policy document that applies to this RestApi regardless of the caller and Method configuration

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the policy in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: binary_media_types
columns.description: The list of binary media types supported by the RestApi. By default, the RestApi supports only UTF-8-encoded text payloads

columns.name: endpoint_configuration_types
columns.description: The endpoint configuration of this RestApi showing the endpoint types of the API

columns.name: endpoint_configuration_vpc_endpoint_ids
columns.description: The endpoint configuration of this RestApi showing the endpoint types of the API

columns.name: warnings
columns.description: The warning messages reported when failonwarnings is turned on during API import
